Translations.Text: He imana rakhanarya lokanno! Juma'ah (sukravara) cya divasi namajasathi ajana dili geli asata tumhi allahacya smaranakade tvarita yeta ja ani kharedi - vikri soduna dya he tumacyasathi adhika cangale ahe, jara tumhi janata asala
Maga jevha namaja purna ho'ila tevha dharativara (itastatah) pasara ani allahaci krpa sodha ani allahace atyadhika smarana kara, yasathi ki tumhi saphalata prapta karuna ghyavi

Ani jevha ekhada sauda vikatana pahatata kinva ekhada tamasa drstisa padala asata tyakade dhavatata ani tumhala ubheca soduna detata. (Tumhi) sanga ki allahajavala je kahi ahe te khela ani vyaparapeksa adhika cangale ahe ani allaha sarvanta cangala roji denara (annadata) ahe
